edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.managers

Class GameDataManager

  • edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.managers.GameDataManager

  • public class GameDataManager

    Singleton class that stores and manages universal game data.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_LIVES
      Maximum number of lives possible throughout the game.

      Gets the current game data singleton being used.

      Get the number of lives the player has left.

      Get the current score of the player.
